Name: Medusa
About the game: Help Medusa find a foregone creature called the Ancient Sludge. In this classic-style Metroidvania you will explore eight unique regions, find items with unique abilities and learn to cast various spells. Each location contains a unique set of enemies. Completing the game at 100% should take at least 5hours. Example of a map system: Example of gameplay:
